answers.answer: It would help to know when you tested - fasting or 2-4 hours after a meal - but you kept this a secret from us. We can't comment on your test results w/o knowing this.

It was before and after 2 hours after , anyways my reading are generally higher today then when i posted when i woke up ii was 7.2  after breakfast 2 hours 1 was 8.2  befor lunch i was 7.5 2 hours after lunch i jumped to 20.5 befor dinner i was 8.1 2 hours after dinner i was 12.9 I definatly need to ssee a dietition and ssorry for leaving info out i have no clue about anything  , thanks have a goodd night

Thanks for responding, and no need to apologize. Consider it human error, something we all do at times. Your glucose levels are definitely very high and close to dangerous. Please see a doctor and get medication to help lower and control your levels. If you Google search the words diabetes nutrition you will find many helpful links on nutrition (good and bad foods) - don't eat bad carbs, sugary food or liquids containing sugar. Try to eat in smaller portions spread out during the day to help ease the glucose entering your body. Stop smoking, lose weight, and perform moderate exercise will all help to reduce your levels.Good luck.
They do sound like they are a bit high.  I don't know.  Have you tried calling your doctor's office and asked?

question: i just got me meter and strips and i am waiting to go see a diabeties centre to learn more i did  4 tests today 6.5   7,9    8.5 and 9.8 is this high or am i ok i thought it was supossed to be at 6 .5 is this true? any answer will be appreciated and advice just new to this and  kind of worried about this as my mother died this year due to diabeties and  i am sort of nervous.Thank you Terry68
